name: Deep Journey (DPimenta, dario-santos)
description:
A game that was finalist at the PlayStation Talens 2018, including the nominee for the best art award.

This is the story of an uninspired artist that tries to find his inspiration in the art of other people (real references, education purpose).

Keyboard:

AWSD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

Ctrl - Interact

In the puzzle sections: Spacebar to select
